html:
1.15.21  12:16 pm   if 12 am is morning time, then 12 pm must be nighttime. so if you went to sleep at some time before 12 am, and woke up at 12 pm, have you basically slept your day away?

      no

1.15.21  11:54 am   how long was the long long long journey?

      it's a loop, with a net length of 1

1.15.21  11:42 am   What is it like writing songs about love when you've never actually loved anyone in your whole life?

      every song is about love. there's really nothing i can do about that

1.15.21  11:19 am   how long does the song selection process usually take?

      just long enough for my entire life to flash before my eyes

1.15.21  11:16 am   Are you working on a big project or any songs right now

      average project. video for song. will do another one after that

1.15.21  11:16 am   as an artist, how does it feel like to work for months on a 3 minutes video that 99% of people will watch once and say "eh, neat" and miss nearly all the little details you spent hundreds of hours putting in the video and song?

      as a nay sayer,

1.15.21  11:12 am   How do you make soap?

      take all the dirt in the world and mash it together

1.15.21  11:03 am   opinions of the establishment

      sometimes my mind runs wild, just trying to imagine how established they truly are

1.15.21  10:40 am   I RAN OUT OF DRAWING IDEAS! WHAT DO I DO?

      try an idea for a sequence of drawings

1.15.21  10:27 am   Why is the frontier always good until the authority figures step in and ruin it?

      reading between the lines here, it would be because they haven't yet ruined it

1.15.21  9:59 am   where should i go to get wisdom?

      anywhere. it's everywhere

1.15.21  9:56 am   What is your opinion on capitalism bill?

      the price keeps changing

1.15.21  9:55 am   i am not afraid of failure i am afraid of success. does that make sense

      sure

1.15.21  9:32 am   When improvising over a tune are you thinking mainly harmonicaly or more along the melody of the song.

      it's like holding a baby. you have to carry the whole song in your arms. sing songs to the song

1.15.21  9:26 am   are you going to randomly going to post songs.

      well no, there is a very logical reason why i would post songs. it would be because i love songs and have made some due to loving them

1.15.21  8:59 am   Hey Bill, what do you do when you want to want to create, but currently do not want to create?

      choose a specific time you will create. make a date of it

1.15.21  8:25 am   whats the worst threat to humanity other than humanity itself?

      nature?

1.15.21  7:26 am   What was the first question anyone asked you?

     i don't remember

     Also what do you think about becoming music Jesus 2?

      that seems a little ...... inappropriate

1.15.21  7:11 am   Does your new song end on a 1 chord?

      yes

1.15.21  6:36 am   Bill how is video going?

     pretty good

     And also how to cook ice cream?

      maybe bring it to arizona

1.15.21  6:21 am   Why do you use capital letters sparingly?

      i , but, one of the reasons you may think i am sparing about it is if you had never watched any of my videos

1.15.21  5:53 am   What's your favorite 3d shape?

      dot

1.15.21  4:05 am   do you have cool dreams

      yes, but that's only one side of the story

1.15.21  4:02 am   do you like sports?

      i must admit i like the ball

1.15.21  3:35 am   Is the world dead yet?

      no

1.15.21  2:37 am   I'm going out to get some sleep, want me to bring you anything?

      how about some dreams

1.15.21  2:25 am   am i a good person?

      sure

1.15.21  1:38 am   Over 20 years ago in college my painting teacher asked our class "why do humans make art?" We all had different answers. His answer was "to live forever" I felt wierd about this. I think about this questino several times a week to this day and never feel satisfied with my answer. What's your answer?. 

      it can be made for any reason

1.15.21  12:24 am   do you like instant ramen?

      too quick for me

1.14.21  10:35 pm   Who would you say is your biggest inspiration?

      could be you

1.14.21  10:24 pm   what are your hobbies

      jumping around hoops, without going through them

1.14.21  10:15 pm   hi bill last time i asked an ask i asked if you could tell me how to make music. i can now happily inform you that i am a real boy who makes music. are you proud of me

      yes

1.14.21  10:10 pm   so sometimes when i make a thing i get so proud that i just look at it, at what i've made, for hours and don't keep making it. i see this as a problem (even though i enjoy proudly looking at the thing i made because it makes me proud) what do you think of this

      ah, but consider the alternative ......... hating the thing

1.14.21  9:52 pm   What is Steve's real name?

      your name

1.14.21  9:29 pm   How much denim do you think there is in the world?

      just enough

1.14.21  9:16 pm   Is Steve a representation of the common independent person?

      maybe in the covid era

1.14.21  8:43 pm   can you relate: sometimes i'll type into my keyboard "randomly", just to get my fingers moving while i'm lost in thought or whatever, but instead of gibberish it's the partial or entire phrase "there isn't anything I wouldn't do for you"

      that makes sense

1.14.21  8:06 pm   What is a thing?

      got to be some sort of object

1.14.21  7:40 pm   have you ever made a bad song on purpose

      i've tried, but it only works when i do it by accident

1.14.21  6:51 pm   What is the number one rule for comedy

      nothing is funny

1.14.21  6:39 pm   What your favorite cereal?

      crispix

1.14.21  6:30 pm   do ever have bad ideas? 

      yes

1.14.21  6:23 pm   were doing poetry in class any ideas on what i should write about

      the page

1.14.21  6:18 pm   Ever tried visualizing doing something then catching yourself doing it while you're thinking of doing it then you realize you're doing it then you become incapable or unmotivated to do it anymore so you just stop and think and have an existential crisis then go back to doing it again

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.14.21  5:31 pm   How can I try to sing your songs? 

      how about standing on a chair first

1.14.21  5:26 pm   did you stop making videos?

      no

1.14.21  5:04 pm   in "at the airport terminal" were you comparing the terminal to a passage between life and death...like were you...like were you?

      no, but sometimes songs can have a mind of their own

1.14.21  5:04 pm   when will you go on tour?

      yes

1.14.21  4:47 pm   what is your type of humour?

      doors,

1.14.21  4:42 pm   do you finally know how to say goodbye?

      no
